title: Keep that ridiculously pointless artificial reef out of our oceans please.

replies.body:
"An artificial reef is a human-made underwater structure, typically built to promote marine life in areas with a generally featureless bottom, to control erosion, block ship passage, or improve surfing."

I agree OP, marine life is not important in any way whatsoever. %%%% fish, %%%% sharks, %%%% seaweed, %%%% all of the economic ramifications the lack of sea products would bring, and most of all, %%%% having a sustainable ecosystem.
#%%%%TheSea

> [{quoted}](name=HeartVine,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=d40OTZWq,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-01-26T07:59:53.179+0000)
>
> Teach me senpai!

But I looked up to you as my senpai. Each night, I go to sleep, praying to God that I may be "fine like the vine."
I wonder how much hes being paid... and if its from Abbortt

It doesn't take a genius to spend 5 seconds typing "Artificial reef" into google to see what exactly it does silly.

It's not pointless.

I still have faith in humanity, trust me.

Yes!
Then you have more faith than me. I salute you good sir!
